title: Can you get championship riven from hextec?
body: me and my friends were having the discussion on if you can get champion ship riven or not from hextec.

replies.body:
Championship Riven, No.
Championship Riven 2016, Yes.
I traded 3 skin shards and got Championship Riven...

My understanding is that legacy skins are available through hextech crafting or mystery gifting.  Championship Riven was updated to have a legacy version, so you should be able to find it with some luck.  Good luck!  :D
